course.subject: MATH
course.name: Advanced Modeling Interest-rate, Credit and Inflation Derivative
course.description: This course introduces recent progresses in volatility smile modeling under the framework of market model for interest-rate derivatives markets, the extension of market model to credit and inflation derivatives, and the theory of valuation  adjustments that arises after the 2007-08 financial crisis. Students without course prerequisite should seek instructor's approval to take the course.
course.prerequisites: (MAFS 5030 OR MATH 5510) AND (MAFS 5040 OR MATH 5520)
